description: This easy stir-fry recipe is perfect for a midweek meal in a hurry. Honey soy tofu packs loads of flavour into this budget-friendly vegetarian dinner.
name: Honey and soy tofu stir-fry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 400 g Macro Organic honey soy tofu
2 tbs Macro Organic Spanish extra virgin olive oil
450 g Macro Organic frozen broccoli florets

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a large non-stick frying pan over high heat. Cook tofu, turning, for 2 minutes or until light golden. Add broccoli and half the cashews, and cook, stirring, for 2 minutes or until broccoli has heated through. Add reserved marinade and cook, tossing, until well combined. Divide rice and stir-fry among bowls and serve with remaining cashews.
